ygData.subject: Re: Gnome quest
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I remember, he doesn t have that many hit points, you just have to somehow survive the incredible amount of spell damage he can dish out...
ygData.messageBody:
From what I remember, he doesn't have that many hit
points, you just have to somehow survive the incredible
amount of spell damage he can dish out...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rob Berryhill [SMTP:racefan@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 2:39 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Gnome quest
>
> From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>
> I should also mention that level 25 people run in terror at the sight of
> Borxx. He casts spells that do over 200 dmg.
>
> Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
> Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
> http://www.hoa-rpg.com/
>
